adrFormatAddress: 40 Waterside Plaza, New York, NY 10010, USA

originalText.text: I highly recommend working with Jennifer Muldowney. I  was introduced to her just before my husband passed away from brain cancer at age 41. I wanted to plan a special and non-traditional memorial service. I worked with Jennifer and planned we planned a very memorable and personal event that exceeded my expectations and honor my husband’s life. I  told her what I wanted and she made it all happen seamlessly, worked within a quick schedule, and the budget we agreed upon.  Her and her team were caring and understanding and easy to work with during an extremely difficult time.

originalText.text: I love Jennifer! Her energy and enthusiasm and passion for her work is amazing!  She created the most wonderful and touching memorial documentary about my husband.  Since I am in the communications business, I certainly had my doubts about having a funeral home produce this movie, but after meeting Jennifer, I knew she would do a smashing job.  She and the funeral director and the editor were a fabulous team. Jennifer became part of our family. She worked on this 24/7 for a month and we had a lot of fun and produced a most fantastic and professional memorial, highly acclaimed by friends and family.

text.text: I love Jennifer! Her energy and enthusiasm and passion for her work is amazing!  She created the most wonderful and touching memorial documentary about my husband.  Since I am in the communications business, I certainly had my doubts about having a funeral home produce this movie, but after meeting Jennifer, I knew she would do a smashing job. originalText.text: Jennifer is a wonderful, compassionate professional.  She is empathetic and guides you through the entire memorial planning process.  She coordinated everything from the venue and celebrant to decorations and music, while staying on budget.  What I loved best about working with Jennifer, is that she really listened to what was special about my late husband and incorporated it into the day.  Having a memorial service that celebrates a loved one in they style they would want is priceless.   If you have to plan a memorial, and I hope you don't, you should definitely work with Jennifer - I can't recommend her enough.

originalText.text:
Jennifer was a delight to work with! She was professional, organized, efficient, and is a genuinely caring person! Jennifer provided safe transport of our parents’ ashes abroad, arranged for a boat for scattering the ashes at sea, assisted in organizing a special scattering of ashes ceremony, and provided a delicious luncheon on board afterward. Her presence ensured that everything went off seamlessly and her engaging personality helped to put us all at ease on this meaningful and emotional day. We could not have been happier with the services Jennifer provided to our family and we highly recommend her for her unique and personal touch. As others have said, she is a gem!
Ross and Kathy Nabatoff

originalText.text: Muldowney Memorials was recommended by our wonderful Funeral Director at Sparrow Funeral Home in Greenpoint, Brooklyn. Jennifer was incredibly kind, compassionate, thoughtful and intelligent. She put me at ease with her warmth and did a beautiful job honoring our loved one. Given the awful situation we were in, I am grateful to have been in the care of Jennifer.
